website_summaries.verdict: An adorable party favor that your guests will actually use.
pros: Choose from it’s a boy or it’s a girl pattern
Click the pens to reveal 3 different messages
Pens glide smoothly and sit at a low price point
cons: Sometimes pens get stuck when clicking – you may have to wiggle the top a bit

customer_reviews.title: Not okay!  I didnt order ARABIC PENS!
customer_reviews.text: Um . . If I wanted to buy ARABIC baby girl pens I WOULD HAVE ORDERED THEM!!!!! I ordered two boxes of these . . One box was entirely in Arabic. How embarrassing to put these out for guests at a baby shower in little jars and have half of them in Arabic with words you cant even understand. NOT HAPPY AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jaeger White

customer_reviews.title: Cute for baby shower
customer_reviews.text: These were well received at my friend’s baby shower. The guests were able to use these for some of the games and then take them home. They are really cute and only a couple of them out of the three packages I purchased got stuck where you could not read the messages. I bought extra anyway and tested them all so it was not a problem for me. I did bring the leftover pens to my office for everyone to use. They don’t last super long but they are cute and do work while they last. For something that is a novelty they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Jen W

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for value
customer_reviews.text: These pens were very cute and given as favors. They were all in the box, all of them functioned properly and they arrived on time. Highly recommend buying these with guess cards to be filled out. They went quickly!
customer_reviews.author: L.Tex

customer_reviews.title: Cute baby shower decor
customer_reviews.text: These were used for a baby shower for guests to sign and address envelopes and advice cards when they entered. They wrote well and were also very cute!
customer_reviews.author: KML

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was worried would be cheap and not write smoothly if at all but I was wrong very nice and so happy to have for shower games as well as a favor
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Galli

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional, adorable baby sayings with each click!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved these pens at the baby shower! They were a cute addition to the "games" table - the guests used them to write for all the games, and took them home in addition to the gift bags. They're very easy to hold, they write well, and the different sayings are so cute! Very clever design.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLANT INK PEN THAT CHANGE CAPTIONS EVERY TIME YOU CLICK IT ON AND OFF🥰
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 to 3 packs as give-away gifts for the guests at the baby shower AFTER THEY USED them to play the written games. LUV ❣LUV 🥰LUV ❣

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The pens are adorable with the sayings they have on them. Made of good quality and I'm sure the ladies will love them when they use them for the baby shower games! Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Great baby shower addition

customer_reviews.title: Great ink quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a baby shower. It was one of the cheaper pens i found so I thought the quality would be subpar. Boy was I wrong! Very high quality pens! Not flimsy or light. The black ink is actually very smooth to write with. It is ballpoint. It is also now my favorite pen because it writes so smoothly and dark. Everytime you click the pen a new message appears on the body of the pen. Very cute!

product_meta.title: Darice It’s a Girl Pen with Three Sayings (12pc) – Perfect for Baby Girl Shower Games and Favors – Sayings Change When Pen is Clicked – Comfortable Black Ink Pen Writes Dark and Smooth
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackDarcie's fun pink "it's a girl!" pens show a different saying, up to 3 each time the pen is clicked. There are 12 pens per package.
feature_bullets: BABY GIRL SHOWER – “It’s a Girl” pink and purple pens are a perfect addition to a baby girl shower. Leave them on tables to use during games and guests can take them home as a favor when they leave!
THREE CUTE SAYINGS – Each time the top of the pen is clicked, one of three sayings appear: “sugar and spice and all things nice,” “welcome baby,” and “thank heaven for little girls.”
BLACK INK PEN – The black ink pen is comfortable to hold and write with. The pen writes smoothly with dark ink. You will love using this pen long after the shower!
ANNOUNCE THE GOOD NEWS – It’s a Girl pens are a great way to announce the exciting news that a baby girl has been born! Pass them out at work or when visitors stop by the hospital or at home.

FIND YOUR INSPIRATION – Since 1954, Darice has been inspiring creativity with the best value and selection of art and craft supplies for every level crafter. From scrapbooking to jewelry making, kids’ crafts to fine art, floral design to your latest Pinterest project, Darice has over 45,000 items for every level of crafter.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars274 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Darice it’s a girl pen with three sayings
